<TABLE ID=MTAB35 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA36 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA37 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Purpose of the Program
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	.
</B>
	The Company&#8217;s Discretionary Director Restricted Stock Program (&#8220;Program&#8221;) under the 2015 Sypris Omnibus Plan (as amended from time to time, the &#8220;Plan&#8221;) shall be effective for all Awards incorporating these terms on or after January 21, 2016, to advance the Company&#8217;s growth and prosperity by providing long-term financial incentives to its Directors, and to further the Company&#8217;s philosophy of equity ownership by the Company&#8217;s Directors in accordance with the Company&#8217;s Equity Ownership Guidelines.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA38 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB40 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA41 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA42 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Restricted Shares
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	.
</B>
	Each &#8220;Restricted Share&#8221; is one Share of the Common Stock (subject to adjustments per the Plan)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	which is subject to forfeiture before its Vesting Date,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	as set forth below.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA43 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB45 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA46 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	2.1.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA47 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Restricted Share Vesting
</U>
	. Unless otherwise determined by the Committee, grants of Restricted Shares will vest 100% on the third anniversary of the Grant Date (the &#8220;Vesting Date&#8221;), unless forfeited before such Vesting Date.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA48 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB50 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA51 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	2.2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA52 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Distribution
</U>
	. All Restricted Shares will be held by the Company or issued in book entry form until the Vesting Date, and physically distributed to the Participant thereafter, with any legends required by applicable Rules. Participants may vote and receive cash dividends on such Restricted Shares, as applicable, after the Grant Date.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA53 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB55 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA56 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	3.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA57 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Future Awards
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	. Future awards, if any, are strictly subject to the sole discretion of the Committee and receipt of any Award does not guarantee that a Participant will receive future Awards.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TABLE ID=MTAB60 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA61 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">

<B>
	4.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA62 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Termination
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	. If the Participant&#8217;s service on the Board of Directors is terminated for any reason or no reason, each unvested Restricted Share will terminate, expire, and be forfeited as provided in Article V of the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA63 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB65 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA66 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	5.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA67 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Administration
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	. The Committee shall have complete authority to administer or interpret the Program or any Award, to prescribe, amend, and rescind rules and regulations relating thereto, and to make all other determinations necessary or advisable for the administration of the Program or any Award Agreements (including to establish or amend any rules regarding the Program that are necessary or advisable to comply with, or qualify under, any applicable law, listing requirement, regulation, or policy of any entity, agency, organization, governmental entity, or the Company, in the Committee&#8217;s sole discretion (&#8220;Rule&#8221;)). In addition, with respect to any future grants or the unvested portion of any Award, the Committee may amend or terminate these Terms or any Awards, in its sole discretion without the consent of any Director or beneficiary, subject to applicable Rules, at any time and from time-to-time. With respect to any amendment, action, or approval hereunder, the Committee may require the approval of any other persons or entities, pursuant to applicable Rules. The decisions of the Committee in interpreting and applying the Program will be final.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P ID=PARA106.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<TABLE STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/30/0001437749-16-028628_EX1010IMG001.JPG" WIDTH=710 HEIGHT=121>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB70 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA71 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	6.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA72 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Section 83(b) Election.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Under Section 83 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the "Code"), a Participant may elect to be taxed at the time the Restricted Shares are acquired, rather than when such Restricted Shares vest, by filing an election with the Internal Revenue Service within thirty (30) days after the Grant Date.
<B>
	IT IS THE PARTICIPANT&#8217;S SOLE RESPONSIBILITY, AND NOT THE COMPANY&#39;S, TO FILE A TIMELY ELECTION UNDER
</B>
<B>
	CODE
</B>
<B>
	SECTION 83(b), EVEN IF THE PARTICIPANT REQUESTS THE COMPANY OR ITS REPRESENTATIVES TO MAKE THIS FILING ON
</B>
<B>
	THE PARTICIPANT&#8217;S
</B>
<B>
	BEHALF. THE PARTICIPANT MUST RELY SOLELY ON HIS
</B>
<B>
	OR HER
</B>
<B>
	OWN ADVISORS WITH RESPECT TO THE DECISION AS TO WHETHER OR NOT TO FILE ANY
</B>
<B>
	CODE SECTION
</B>
<B>
	83(b) ELECTION.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA73 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

</B>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">

	7.1.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA83 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	No Other Rights
</U>
	. The Awards include no other rights beyond those expressly provided in the Plan, the Program, or the Award Agreement. Awards are non-assignable and non-transferable except by will or the laws of descent and distribution, unless otherwise approved by the Committee.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	7.2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA88 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Taxes
</U>
	. The Participant must arrange for all tax withholding obligations related to any Award. Tax withholding obligations may be satisfied by any of the following methods, as determined by the Committee in its sole discretion: (i) cash, (ii) surrender of Shares of then-equivalent value (including the surrender of Shares otherwise to be received in connection with the vesting of an Award), or (iii) other forms of payment as determined by the Committee. The maximum number of Shares that may be withheld from any Award to satisfy any federal, state, or local tax withholding requirements upon the lapse of restrictions applicable to an Award cannot exceed such number of Shares having a Fair Market Value equal to the minimum statutory amount required by the Company to be withheld and paid to any such federal, state, or local taxing authority with respect to such lapse of restrictions.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: #000000 1PX SOLID; WIDTH: 53.4%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">

	[18 Month Anniversary]

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Intending to be legally bound by all such Terms, the Program, and the Plan, I acknowledge the sole authority of the Committee to interpret the terms of the foregoing, the forfeiture of my rights upon any termination of my employment under such Terms, and my continuing status as an &#8220;at will&#8221; employee (subject to termination without cause or notice). I have received and had an opportunity to review, with the benefit of any legal counsel of my choosing (any such legal counsel to be retained at my own expense), the Plan, the Program, and this Award Agreement.
</FONT>

</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/30/0001437749-16-028628_EX1014IMG001.JPG" WIDTH=688 HEIGHT=126>

<P ID=PARA34 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB36 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA37 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA38 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Purpose of the Program
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	.
</B>
	The Company&#8217;s Eighteen Month Restricted Stock Program (&#8220;Program&#8221;) under the 2015 Sypris Omnibus Plan (as amended from time to time, the &#8220;Plan&#8221;) shall be effective for all Awards incorporating these terms on or after May 19, 2015, to advance the Company&#8217;s growth and prosperity by providing long-term financial incentives to its key employees, and to further the Company&#8217;s philosophy of equity ownership by the Company&#8217;s officers in accordance with the Company&#8217;s Equity Ownership Guidelines.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA39 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB41 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA42 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA43 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Restricted Shares
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	.
</B>
	Each &#8220;Restricted Share&#8221; is one Share of the Common Stock (subject to adjustments per the Plan)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	which is subject to forfeiture before its Vesting Date,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	as set forth below.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA44 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB46 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA47 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	2.1.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA48 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Restricted Share Vesting
</U>
	. Unless otherwise determined by the Committee, grants of Restricted Shares will vest 100% on or about the eighteen month anniversary of the Grant Date (the &#8220;Vesting Date&#8221;), unless forfeited before such Vesting Date.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA49 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">

<TABLE ID=MTAB51 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	2.2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA53 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Distribution
</U>
	. All Restricted Shares will be held by the Company or issued in book entry form until the Vesting Date, and physically distributed to the Participant thereafter, with any legends required by applicable Rules. Participants may vote and receive cash dividends on such Restricted Shares, as applicable, after the Grant Date.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">

</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">

<TABLE ID=MTAB61 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA62 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">

<B>
	4.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA63 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Leaves of Absence
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	. The Committee may in its discretion treat all or any portion of any period during which a Participant is on military or other approved leave of absence as a period of employment for purposes of the accrual of rights hereunder.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA64 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">

</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB66 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA67 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">

	5.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA68 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Termination
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	. If the Participant&#8217;s employment is terminated for any reason or no reason, each unvested Restricted Share will terminate, expire, and be forfeited as provided in Article V of the Plan. (The Committee has sole discretion to determine whether a demotion is a &#8220;termination&#8221; of employment.)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA69 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB71 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA72 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	6.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA73 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Administration
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	. The Committee shall have complete authority to administer or interpret the Program or any Award, to prescribe, amend, and rescind rules and regulations relating thereto, and to make all other determinations necessary or advisable for the administration of the Program or any Award Agreements (including to establish or amend any rules regarding the Program that are necessary or advisable to comply with, or qualify under, any applicable law, listing requirement, regulation, or policy of any entity, agency, organization, governmental entity, or the Company, in the Committee&#8217;s sole discretion (&#8220;Rule&#8221;)). In addition, with respect to any future grants or the unvested portion of any Award, the Committee may amend or terminate these Terms or any Awards, in its sole discretion without the consent of any employee or beneficiary, subject to applicable Rules, at any time and from time-to-time. With respect to any amendment, action, or approval hereunder, the Committee may require the approval of any other persons or entities, pursuant to applicable Rules. The decisions of the Committee in interpreting and applying the Program will be final.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA74 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
</FONT>

<P ID=PARA105.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/30/0001437749-16-028628_EX1014IMG001.JPG" WIDTH=688 HEIGHT=126>
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB76 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA77 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	7.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA78 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Section 83(b) Election.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Under Section 83 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the "Code"), a Participant may elect to be taxed at the time the Restricted Shares are acquired, rather than when such Restricted Shares vest, by filing an election with the Internal Revenue Service within thirty (30) days after the Grant Date.
<B>
	IT IS THE PARTICIPANT&#8217;S SOLE RESPONSIBILITY, AND NOT THE COMPANY&#39;S, TO FILE A TIMELY ELECTION UNDER
</B>
<B>
	CODE
</B>
<B>
	SECTION 83(b), EVEN IF THE PARTICIPANT REQUESTS THE COMPANY OR ITS REPRESENTATIVES TO MAKE THIS FILING ON
</B>
<B>
	THE PARTICIPANT&#8217;S
</B>
<B>
	BEHALF. THE PARTICIPANT MUST RELY SOLELY ON HIS
</B>
<B>
	OR HER
</B>
<B>
	OWN ADVISORS WITH RESPECT TO THE DECISION AS TO WHETHER OR NOT TO FILE ANY
</B>
<B>
	CODE SECTION
</B>
<B>
	83(b) ELECTION.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA79 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA80 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 1PT; FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB82 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA83 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	8.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA84 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Miscellaneous
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	. Unless otherwise specified, all capitalized terms herein shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Plan or in the Award Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA85 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB87 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA88 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	8.1.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA89 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	No Other Rights
</U>
	. The Awards include no other rights beyond those expressly provided in the Plan, the Program, or the Award Agreement. Awards are non-assignable and non-transferable except by will or the laws of descent and distribution, unless otherwise approved by the Committee.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA90 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB92 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA93 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	8.2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA94 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Taxes
</U>
	. The Participant must arrange for all tax withholding obligations related to any Award. Tax withholding obligations may be satisfied by any of the following methods, as determined by the Committee in its sole discretion: (i) cash, (ii) surrender of Shares of then-equivalent value (including the surrender of Shares otherwise to be received in connection with the vesting of an Award), or (iii) other forms of payment as determined by the Committee. The maximum number of Shares that may be withheld from any Award to satisfy any federal, state, or local tax withholding requirements upon the lapse of restrictions applicable to an Award cannot exceed such number of Shares having a Fair Market Value equal to the minimum statutory amount required by the Company to be withheld and paid to any such federal, state, or local taxing authority with respect to such lapse of restrictions.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA95 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

</TD>

	8.3.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA99 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Delegation
</U>
	. The Committee may delegate any portion of their responsibilities and powers to one or more persons selected by them, subject to applicable Rules. Such delegation may be revoked by the Committee at any time.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	Intending to be legally bound by all such Terms, the Program, and the Plan, I acknowledge the sole authority of the Committee to interpret the terms of the foregoing, the forfeiture of my rights upon any termination of my employment under such Terms, and my continuing status as an &#8220;at will&#8221; employee (subject to termination without cause or notice). </TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</P>

<TABLE STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

<TABLE ID=MTAB37 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA38 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA39 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Purpose of the Program
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	.
</B>
	The Company&#8217;s Three Year Restricted Stock Program (&#8220;Program&#8221;) under the 2015 Sypris Omnibus Plan (as amended from time to time, the &#8220;Plan&#8221;) shall be effective for all Awards incorporating these terms on or after May 19, 2015, to advance the Company&#8217;s growth and prosperity by providing long-term financial incentives to its key employees, and to further the Company&#8217;s philosophy of equity ownership by the Company&#8217;s officers in accordance with the Company&#8217;s Equity Ownership Guidelines.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA40 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB42 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA43 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA44 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Restricted Shares
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	.
</B>
	Each &#8220;Restricted Share&#8221; is one Share of the Common Stock (subject to adjustments per the Plan)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	which is subject to forfeiture before its Vesting Date,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	as set forth below.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA45 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB47 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA48 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	2.1.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA49 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Restricted Share Vesting
</U>
	. Unless otherwise determined by the Committee, grants of Restricted Shares will vest 100% on the third anniversary of the Grant Date (the &#8220;Vesting Date&#8221;), unless forfeited before such Vesting Date.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA50 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">

	2.2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA54 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Distribution
</U>
	. All Restricted Shares will be held by the Company or issued in book entry form until the Vesting Date, and physically distributed to the Participant thereafter, with any legends required by applicable Rules. Participants may vote and receive cash dividends on such Restricted Shares, as applicable, after the Grant Date.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Leaves of Absence
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	. The Committee may in its discretion treat all or any portion of any period during which a Participant is on military or other approved leave of absence as a period of employment for purposes of the accrual of rights hereunder.
</FONT>
</P>

</TR>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Termination
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	. If the Participant&#8217;s employment is terminated for any reason or no reason, each unvested Restricted Share will terminate, expire, and be forfeited as provided in Article V of the Plan. (The Committee has sole discretion to determine whether a demotion is a &#8220;termination&#8221; of employment.)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA74 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Administration
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	. The Committee shall have complete authority to administer or interpret the Program or any Award, to prescribe, amend, and rescind rules and regulations relating thereto, and to make all other determinations necessary or advisable for the administration of the Program or any Award Agreements (including to establish or amend any rules regarding the Program that are necessary or advisable to comply with, or qualify under, any applicable law, listing requirement, regulation, or policy of any entity, agency, organization, governmental entity, or the Company, in the Committee&#8217;s sole discretion (&#8220;Rule&#8221;)). In addition, with respect to any future grants or the unvested portion of any Award, the Committee may amend or terminate these Terms or any Awards, in its sole discretion without the consent of any employee or beneficiary, subject to applicable Rules, at any time and from time-to-time. With respect to any amendment, action, or approval hereunder, the Committee may require the approval of any other persons or entities, pursuant to applicable Rules. The decisions of the Committee in interpreting and applying the Program will be final.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	- 2 -&nbsp;

	&nbsp;

<P ID=PARA106.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/30/0001437749-16-028628_EX1015IMG001.JPG" WIDTH=707 HEIGHT=127>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB77 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA78 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	7.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA79 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Section 83(b) Election.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Under Section 83 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the "Code"), a Participant may elect to be taxed at the time the Restricted Shares are acquired, rather than when such Restricted Shares vest, by filing an election with the Internal Revenue Service within thirty (30) days after the Grant Date.
<B>
	IT IS THE PARTICIPANT&#8217;S SOLE RESPONSIBILITY, AND NOT THE COMPANY&#39;S, TO FILE A TIMELY ELECTION UNDER
</B>
<B>
	CODE
</B>
<B>
	SECTION 83(b), EVEN IF THE PARTICIPANT REQUESTS THE COMPANY OR ITS REPRESENTATIVES TO MAKE THIS FILING ON
</B>
<B>
	THE PARTICIPANT&#8217;S
</B>
<B>
	BEHALF. THE PARTICIPANT MUST RELY SOLELY ON HIS
</B>
<B>
	OR HER
</B>
<B>
	OWN ADVISORS WITH RESPECT TO THE DECISION AS TO WHETHER OR NOT TO FILE ANY
</B>
<B>
	CODE SECTION
</B>
<B>
	83(b) ELECTION.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA80 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA90 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	No Other Rights
</U>
	. The Awards include no other rights beyond those expressly provided in the Plan, the Program, or the Award Agreement. Awards are non-assignable and non-transferable except by will or the laws of descent and distribution, unless otherwise approved by the Committee.
</FONT>
</P>

</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA91 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB93 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA94 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	8.2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA95 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Taxes
</U>
	. The Participant must arrange for all tax withholding obligations related to any Award. Tax withholding obligations may be satisfied by any of the following methods, as determined by the Committee in its sole discretion: (i) cash, (ii) surrender of Shares of then-equivalent value (including the surrender of Shares otherwise to be received in connection with the vesting of an Award), or (iii) other forms of payment as determined by the Committee. The maximum number of Shares that may be withheld from any Award to satisfy any federal, state, or local tax withholding requirements upon the lapse of restrictions applicable to an Award cannot exceed such number of Shares having a Fair Market Value equal to the minimum statutory amount required by the Company to be withheld and paid to any such federal, state, or local taxing authority with respect to such lapse of restrictions.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA96 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB98 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA99 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	8.3.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA100 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	Delegation
</U>
	. The Committee may delegate any portion of their responsibilities and powers to one or more persons selected by them, subject to applicable Rules. Such delegation may be revoked by the Committee at any time.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA101 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P ID=PARA33.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.16
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P ID=PARA34 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Four
</B>
<B>
	-Year Stock Option Terms of Awards
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA35 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<U>
<B>
	of the
</B>
</U>
<U>
<B>
	2015
</B>
</U>
<U>
<B>
	Sypris
</B>
</U>
<U>
<B>
	Omnibus
</B>
</U>
<U>
<B>
	Plan (&#8220;Plan&#8221;)
</B>
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA36 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA37 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA38 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Awards
</B>
	&#8211; All Options granted hereunder will be non-qualified Options subject to, and governed by, the terms of the Plan, the Terms and a valid, executed Award Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA39 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA40 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Options
</B>
	&#8211; Each Option is the right to purchase one Share at the Option Price, from its Vesting Date until its Expiration Date or forfeiture (subject to adjustments per the Plan). Options must be exercised with 48 hours advance written notice, unless waived by the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA41 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA42 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Option Price
</B>
	&#8211; &#8220;Option Price&#8221; means the closing price per Share on the Grant Date. The Option Price is payable to the Company in cash or any other method of payment authorized by the Committee in its discretion, which may include Shares previously owned (valued as the closing price per Share on the exercise date) or Shares otherwise deliverable upon exercise of the Option (valued as the closing price per Share on the exercise date, less the Option Price), in each case in accordance with applicable Rules. Similarly, the Participant must arrange for tax withholding in accordance with applicable Rules, to the satisfaction of the Committee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA43 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA44 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Shareholder Rights &#8211;
</B>
	Holders of Options have no rights as a shareholder of the Company until the Option has been validly exercised and a certificate for Shares underlying such Option has been issued. Except as otherwise provided in the Plan, no adjustments are made for dividends or other rights if the applicable record date occurs before your stock certificate is issued.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA45 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA46 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Vesting
</B>
	&#8211; One hundred percent of the Options shall vest on the third anniversary of the Grant Date (the &#8220;Vesting Date&#8221;), unless forfeited before such Vesting Date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA47 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA48 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Expiration Date
</B>
	&#8211; Each Option&#8217;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Expiration Date will be the fourth anniversary of its Grant Date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA49 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA50 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Forfeiture
</B>
	&#8211; Each Option will terminate, expire and be forfeited as provided in Article V of the Plan. (The Committee has sole discretion to determine whether a demotion is a &#8220;termination&#8221; of employment.)
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA51 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA52 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Leaves of Absence
</B>
	&#8211; The Committee may in its discretion treat all or any portion of any period during which a Participant is on military or on an approved leave of absence as a period of employment for purposes of the accrual of rights hereunder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA53 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA54 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No Other Rights
</B>
	&#8211; The Options include no other rights beyond those expressly provided in the Plan, these Terms or the Award Agreement. Options are non-assignable and non-transferable except by will or the laws of descent and distribution, unless otherwise approved by the Committee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA55 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA56 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	10.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Definitions
</B>
	&#8211; Unless otherwise specified, all capitalized terms herein shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Plan or in the Award Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA57 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA58 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_EXHIBIT_10>

I have received and had an opportunity to review, with the benefit of any legal counsel of my choosing (any such legal counsel to be retained at my own expense), the Plan and the Terms.

</B>

</P>
<P ID=PARA93 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">

<B>
	of the
</B>

</U>
<U>

	Omnibus
</B>
</U>
<U>
<B>
	Plan (&#8220;Plan&#8221;)
</B>
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA94 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA95 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA96 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Awards
</B>
	&#8211; All Options granted hereunder will be non-qualified Options subject to, and governed by, the terms of the Plan, the Terms and a valid, executed Award Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA97 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA98 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Options
</B>
	&#8211; Each Option is the right to purchase one Share at the Option Price, from its Vesting Date until its Expiration Date or forfeiture (subject to adjustments per the Plan). Options must be exercised with 48 hours advance written notice, unless waived by the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA99 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA100 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Option Price
</B>
	&#8211; &#8220;Option Price&#8221; means the closing price per Share on the Grant Date. The Option Price is payable to the Company in cash or any other method of payment authorized by the Committee in its discretion, which may include Shares previously owned (valued as the closing price per Share on the exercise date) or Shares otherwise deliverable upon exercise of the Option (valued as the closing price per Share on the exercise date, less the Option Price), in each case in accordance with applicable Rules. Similarly, the Participant must arrange for tax withholding in accordance with applicable Rules, to the satisfaction of the Committee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA101 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA102 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Shareholder Rights &#8211;
</B>
	Holders of Options have no rights as a shareholder of the Company until the Option has been validly exercised and a certificate for Shares underlying such Option has been issued. Except as otherwise provided in the Plan, no adjustments are made for dividends or other rights if the applicable record date occurs before your stock certificate is issued.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA103 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA104 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Vesting
</B>
	&#8211; One hundred percent of the Options shall vest on the third anniversary of the Grant Date (the &#8220;Vesting Date&#8221;), unless forfeited before such Vesting Date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA105 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA106 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Expiration Date
</B>
	&#8211; Each Option&#8217;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Expiration Date will be the fifth anniversary of its Grant Date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA107 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA108 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Forfeiture
</B>
	&#8211; Each Option will terminate, expire and be forfeited as provided in Article V of the Plan. (The Committee has sole discretion to determine whether a demotion is a &#8220;termination&#8221; of employment.)
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA109 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA110 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Leaves of Absence
</B>
	&#8211; The Committee may in its discretion treat all or any portion of any period during which a Participant is on military or on an approved leave of absence as a period of employment for purposes of the accrual of rights hereunder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA111 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA112 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No Other Rights
</B>
	&#8211; The Options include no other rights beyond those expressly provided in the Plan, these Terms or the Award Agreement. Options are non-assignable and non-transferable except by will or the laws of descent and distribution, unless otherwise approved by the Committee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA113 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA114 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	10.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Definitions
</B>
	&#8211; Unless otherwise specified, all capitalized terms herein shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Plan or in the Award Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA115 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA116 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_EXHIBIT_10>

	5.

</TD>

</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA54 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB56 STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0;FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA57 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(a)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA58 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#39;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">

<B>
	Exhibit 32
</B>

<P ID=PARA2 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -54PT">

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_4"></A>
<P ID=PARA3 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -54PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA4 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -54PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350,
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -54PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA6 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -54PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA7 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -54PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA8 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -54PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA9 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	In connection with the Annual Report of Sypris Solutions, Inc. (the Company) on Form 10-K for the period ending December 31, 2015 as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the Report), each of the undersigned hereby certifies, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Sec. 1350, as adopted pursuant to Sec. 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, in his capacity as an officer of Sypris Solutions, Inc., that to his knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA10 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -54PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA11 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 58.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -22.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Report fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (15 U.S.C. 78m); and
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA12 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 58.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -58.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA13 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 58.5PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -22.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
